document_name: Support to parliament Annual Review Report 2013

outputs.output_descr: The project works to build the capacities of governance structures of National Assembly and Senate to effectively perform their mandates and ensure that their Committees are empowered to effectively scrutinize legislation and executive work. It also supports the operationalization of effective women parliamentary caucuses in national provincial assemblies to consider gender dimension in the work of parliamentary committees. It helps provincial assemblies effectively oversee progress in achievement of MDGs, gender equality and devolution.

project_descr: Federal Parliament and Provincial Assemblies more effectively support and oversee achievement of the country's development goals
